turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm good. I need help ordering a caffè mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks did you want to pickup from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in Colorado Springs Or actually, I'm sorry. It's going to be close to my location in St. Joseph, Missouri.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: off of 28th Street or near 28th Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a grande cafe mocha with skim and whipped cream from the starbucks off of 28th street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set. the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your receipt via mobile.
